name: Liquid Crystal Sandbox (Parsec Version)
description:
This is just an upload (as-is) of the version I've been using to host on Parsec Arcade. It might not run well (if at all) on most machines.


Liquid Crystal is a physics sandbox built around a unified particle-based physics model. Every material is configured from the same set of parameters.

Features Planned for June Steam Early Access Release

There will be major performance improvements, compatibility for older hardware, and new features in the Steam Early Access Release in June. Some of these are:

Block Building

Optimization for Steam Deck

High Framerate Performance Modes (4K @ 120FPS)
